text: saengli gigan-i kkeutnabeolin yeoseong-ilado neohuiga uisimhal gyeong-uneun geunyeo deul-eul wihae jeonghaejin gigan-eun seogdal-i myeo saenglie ileuji anihan yeoseongdo machangajila ttohan imsinhan yeoseong-ui gigan-eun chulsanhal ttaekkajilo hananim-eul dulyeowo hanja hananim-eun geuui il-eul pyeonhage hayeo jusinila
